languages.text: Пострадавший от запуска Горнила монастырь будет перенесен на борт флагмана фон Валанциус в качестве великого реликвария и приюта для Ордена Молота.
The monastery, having been damaged by the launch of the Crucible, will be transferred aboard the von Valancius flagship as a great reliquary and shelter for the Order of the Hammer.
languages.original_text: Пострадавший от запуска Горнила монастырь будет перенесен на борт флагмана фон Валанциус в качестве великого реликвария и приюта для Ордена Молота.

traits.locale_text: The monastery, having been damaged by the launch of the Crucible, will be transferred aboard the von Valancius flagship as a great reliquary and shelter for the Order of the Hammer.

The monastery, having been damaged by the launch of the Crucible, will be transferred aboard the von Valancius flagship as a great reliquary and shelter for the Order of the Hammer.

languages.text: Endommagé par le lancement du Creuset, le monastère sera transféré à bord du vaisseau amiral des von Valancius, où il servira de grand reliquaire et d'abri pour l'Ordre du Marteau.
languages.original_text: The monastery, having been damaged by the launch of the Crucible, will be transferred aboard the von Valancius flagship as a great reliquary and shelter for the Order of the Hammer.

traits.locale_text: Endommagé par le lancement du Creuset, le monastère sera transféré à bord du vaisseau amiral des von Valancius, où il servira de grand reliquaire et d'abri pour l'Ordre du Marteau.

languages.text: この修道院は、坩堝の発動によって損傷を受けたが、フォン・ヴァランシウス旗艦に移送され、ハンマー騎士団のための偉大な聖骨箱や避難所となる。
languages.original_text: The monastery, having been damaged by the launch of the Crucible, will be transferred aboard the von Valancius flagship as a great reliquary and shelter for the Order of the Hammer.

traits.locale_text: この修道院は、坩堝の発動によって損傷を受けたが、フォン・ヴァランシウス旗艦に移送され、ハンマー騎士団のための偉大な聖骨箱や避難所となる。

languages.text: 被熔炉摧毁的修道院将被转移到冯·瓦兰修斯家族的旗舰上，作为巨大的圣骨匣与重锤修会的避难所。
languages.original_text: The monastery, having been damaged by the launch of the Crucible, will be transferred aboard the von Valancius flagship as a great reliquary and shelter for the Order of the Hammer.

traits.locale_text: 被熔炉摧毁的修道院将被转移到冯·瓦兰修斯家族的旗舰上，作为巨大的圣骨匣与重锤修会的避难所。

languages.text: El monasterio, dañado por el lanzamiento de crisol, será trasladado a bordo del buque insignia von Valancius como gran relicario y refugio de la Orden del Martillo.
languages.original_text: The monastery, having been damaged by the launch of the Crucible, will be transferred aboard the von Valancius flagship as a great reliquary and shelter for the Order of the Hammer.

traits.locale_text: El monasterio, dañado por el lanzamiento de crisol, será trasladado a bordo del buque insignia von Valancius como gran relicario y refugio de la Orden del Martillo.

languages.text: Das Kloster wurde durch den Start des Tiegels beschädigt. Es wird nun an Bord des Valancius-Flaggschiffs verlegt, als großes Reliquiar und Zuflucht für den Orden des Hammers.
languages.original_text: The monastery, having been damaged by the launch of the Crucible, will be transferred aboard the von Valancius flagship as a great reliquary and shelter for the Order of the Hammer.

traits.locale_text: Das Kloster wurde durch den Start des Tiegels beschädigt. Es wird nun an Bord des Valancius-Flaggschiffs verlegt, als großes Reliquiar und Zuflucht für den Orden des Hammers.

languages.text: Pota'dan ötürü hasar gören manastır, von Valancius sancak gemisine taşınarak Çekiç Tarikatı'na kutsal emanet odası ve sığınak olarak hizmet edecek.
languages.original_text: The monastery, having been damaged by the launch of the Crucible, will be transferred aboard the von Valancius flagship as a great reliquary and shelter for the Order of the Hammer.
